content.raw:
For gazebo_ros_pkgs, I agree that we would need some #ifdefs to keep things working using different gazebo versions. DRCSim case is being discussed in the pull request.

About the policy to deprecate, I believe that a new major release is a very good moment for the users to know that you probably need to adapt your code. I don't see any important reason to change it.
